name: Callasteroids
description:
Developed for Game Development II (Unity) course.

Game Story : Ashley, the main character, she has a mission to collect all the asteroids on the space. But her mission is not easy, you have to watch out for enemies.

How to Play : W for movement, Mouse for looking direction, "L" key for opening the doors, "Shift" for crouching.

Note : There are few problems and there is a inventory show bug until 5th level (inventory does not show the asteroids).

Producers : Adil Furkan Yıldırım, Mehmet Berkay Topal,  Korhan Sonbahar
